name: anti-materiel slug
description: A custom armor-piercing incendiary slug with an extracted 262gr 9x19mm ETC SAP depleted uranium projectile as its tip, enveloped by a lead outer core which in turn is covered by a copper jacket.

name: micro-flechette shell
description: A shell filled with very tiny tungsten darts, this is a custom hand load for hunting prey made of metal rather than flesh and bones.

name: hardcore slug
description: A custom armor-piercing slug with an extracted 100gr .22 ETC tungsten ball converted into its tip, enveloped by a lead outer core which in turn is covered by a copper jacket.
